resource.name: Berkeley PD Log - Arrests
resource.description: Adult arrests by the Berkeley Police Department over the past 30 days.

domain_metadata.value: Adult arrests by the Berkeley Police Department over the past 30 days

resource.name: Berkeley PD Log - Jail Bookings
resource.description: Adults booked into the Berkeley Police Department Jail over the past 30 days.
columns_description:
FOR MORE INFO SEE THE .PDF ATTACHMENT UNDER THE ABOUT TAB.  The Disposition describes how the detainee left the custody of the Berkeley Police Department Jail.  The following is a legend for disposition codes:

(849(b) PC-RELEASE)	No prosecution requested	
(BAILED)		Released pursuant to bail bond
(CITE-JAIL)		Cited at Jail, then Released
(CITE-MEDICAL)		Cited at Jail, enroute medical
(COURT BOOKING)		Court ordered booking, released
(ENROUTE)		Enroute to other agency	
(HAYWARD COURT)	Moved to Hayward Courthouse
(MEDICAL)		Medical	release
(NO COMPLAINT	)	No complaint sought
(NORTH COUNTY JAIL)	Moved to Glenn Dyer Detention Facility
(SANTA RITA JAIL)		Moved to Santa Rita County Jail
(SANTA RITA-MEDICAL)	Enroute to Santa Rita Jail via 			medical evaluation
The sex of the person booked
FOR MORE INFO SEE THE .PDF ATTACHMENT UNDER THE ABOUT TAB. The Case Number identifies the police report documenting the arrest
A plain text summary description of the statute.  Expand the column to see the complete description.

FOR MORE INFO SEE THE .PDF ATTACHMENT UNDER THE ABOUT TAB. This field contains the booking agency’s Originating Reporting Identifier (ORI).  Every law enforcement agency is assigned a unique ORI for identification purposes.  

The following are the ORI’s of common agencies that transport bookings to the Berkeley City Jail:

(CA0010000)	Alameda County Sheriff's Office
(CA0010200)	Albany Police Department
(CA0010300)	Berkeley Police Department
(CA0010400)	Emeryville Police Department
(CA0012100)	BART Police Department
(CA0019700)	UC Berkeley Police Department
(CA0019970)	CHP - Golden Gate
(CA0073700)	Dept. of Alcoholic Beverage Control
(CA034085G)	Division of Adult Parole Operations

Any agency not listed above is identified as “OTHER”.
Date and time of the booking
The name of the person booked
The race of the person booked
The statutory number section of the violation

The statutory code the statute number is found in. The following are common Statute Types:  (BMC)	Berkeley Municipal Code, (BP) Business and Professional Code, (EC) Education Code, (GC) Government Code, (HN) 	Harbors and Navigations Code, (HS) Health and Safety Code, (PC) Penal Code, (VC) Vehicle Code, (WI)	Welfare and Institutions Code

The Booking Number is a sequential index number that identifies one booking from another. The first four numbers of the Booking Number designate the year, followed by a
hyphen and then a sequential number generated by the
police Records Management System (RMS).
The date of birth of the person booked

domain_metadata.value: Adults booked into the Berkeley Police Department Jail over the past 30 days

resource.name: COVID-19 Confirmed Cases
resource.description: Counts of confirmed COVID-19 cases among Berkeley residents by date. As of 6/21/22, this dataset will be updated weekly instead of daily.
columns_description: Total number of new cases reported by date created in CalREDIE.
Total number of cumulative cases reported by date created in CalREDIE.
Dates reflect the date created in CalREDIE.

domain_metadata.value: Please see attached 1 page narrative for additional details about this dataset.

columns_description: Block level address of event
Day of Week Event Occurred: 0 = Sunday 1 = Monday 2 = Tuesday 3 = Wednesday 4 = Thursday 5 = Friday 6 = Saturday
Date dataset was updated in the portal
Offense Type
Case Number
Description of Event
Date Event Occurred
